```{r, include=FALSE}
esti <-
  params$paths |> 
  map(~ read_csv(.) |> pivot_longer(-c(method, ends_with("Nr")), names_to="loss")) |> 
  reduce(bind_rows)
reference <- 
  esti |> 
  filter(method == .env$params$reference) |> 
  rename(refValue = value) |> 
  select(-method)
best <- 
  esti |> 
  filter(method == .env$params$best) |> 
  rename(bestValue = value) |> 
  select(-method)
data <- 
  esti |> 
  left_join(reference, by = c("truthNr", "obsNr", "taskNr", "loss")) |> 
  left_join(best, by = c("truthNr", "obsNr", "taskNr", "loss")) |> 
  mutate(value = (value - refValue) / (bestValue - refValue)) # skill score
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
nColors <- 256
bkgndCols <- colorRampPalette(c(
  rgb(0.5,1,0.5),
  rgb(1,1,0.5),
  rgb(1,0.5,0.5)))(nColors)

lossColor <- function(score) {
  i <- 1 + round((1-score)*nColors)
  colors <- bkgndCols[i]
  colors[score <= 0] <- rgb(1,0.5,1)
  colors[is.na(colors)] <- rgb(0.6,0.6,0.6)
  colors
}

colorizeTable <- function(k, colorCols, lossTbl) {
  for (i in seq_along(colorCols)) {
    k <- kableExtra::column_spec(
      k, 
      colorCols[i],
      background = lossColor(lossTbl[[i]]))
  }
  k
}
showSkillScoreTable <- function(d, caption, digits=3) {
  nMethods <- length(unique(d$method))
  dText <- 
    d |> 
    mutate(text = sprintf(paste0("%.",digits,"f (%d)"), value, rank)) 
  dWide <- 
    d |> 
    select(method, truthNr, value) |>
    pivot_wider(names_from = method, values_from = value) 
  dTextWide <- 
    dText |> 
    select(method, truthNr, text) |>
    pivot_wider(names_from = method, values_from = text) 
  dTextWide |> 
    kableExtra::kbl(
      caption = caption,
      booktabs = TRUE,
      align = c("l", "l", "l", rep("r", nMethods))
    ) |> 
    kableExtra::kable_styling(
      bootstrap_options = c("condensed"),
      latex_options = c("HOLD_position"),
      full_width = FALSE) |> 
    colorizeTable(1 + seq_len(ncol(dWide)-1), dWide[,-1])
}

showRankScoreTable <- function(d, caption, digits=3) {
  dText <- d
  dText[[2]] <- sprintf(paste0("%.",digits,"f"), dText[[2]])
  dText |> 
    kableExtra::kbl(
      caption = caption,
      booktabs = TRUE,
      align = c("l", "r")
    ) |> 
    kableExtra::kable_styling(
      bootstrap_options = c("condensed"),
      latex_options = c("HOLD_position"),
      full_width = FALSE) |> 
    colorizeTable(2, d[,-1])
}
```


# Skill Scores {.tabset}

```{r results='asis'}
for (tnr in unique(data$taskNr)) {
  cat("## Task", tnr, " {.tabset}\n")
  taskData <- filter(data, taskNr == tnr)
  for (lss in unique(taskData$loss)) {
    cat("### Score", lss, " {.tabset}\n")
    lssData <- filter(taskData, loss == lss)
    for (onr in unique(lssData$obsNr)) {
      cat("#### ObsNr", onr, "\n")
      obsData <- 
        filter(lssData, obsNr == onr) |> 
        group_by(truthNr) |> 
        mutate(value = ifelse(abs(value) <= .Machine$double.eps, 0, value)) |> # make sure that -0 is 0
        mutate(rank = rank(-pmax(0, value), ties.method = "max", na.last = "keep")) |> 
        mutate(rankScore = 1 - (rank - min(rank, na.rm=TRUE)) / (max(rank, na.rm=TRUE) - min(rank, na.rm=TRUE))) |> 
        ungroup()
      cat(showSkillScoreTable(
        obsData,
        paste0("Task ", tnr, ", obsNr ", onr, ": ", lss, " - Skill Scores (Rank)")))
      
      rankScoreData <- 
        obsData |> 
        group_by(method) |> 
        summarize(rankScore = median(rankScore, na.rm = TRUE)) |> 
        arrange(desc(rankScore))
      
      meanScoreData <- 
        obsData |> 
        group_by(method) |> 
        summarize(score = mean(ifelse(value < 0, 0, value), na.rm = TRUE)) |> 
        arrange(desc(score))
      
      cat("\n")
      cat(showRankScoreTable(
        meanScoreData,
        paste0("Task ", tnr, ", obsNr ", onr, ": ", lss, " - Trimmed Mean Score")))
      
      cat("\n")
      cat(showRankScoreTable(
        rankScoreData,
        paste0("Task ", tnr, ", obsNr ", onr, ": ", lss, " - Rank Score")))
    }
  }
}
```
